text: CLOSE Toby Stephens and Molly Parker - who star in Netflix's new series of ` ` Lost in Space'' - discuss the pros and cons of online streaming services. ( April 11 ) AP Justina Machado, lower left, stars in Netflix's'One Day at a Time,'with, clockwise, Isabella Gomez, Rita Moreno and Marcel Ruiz. The 1970s reboot is still breaking new ground, dealing with PTSD, pay inequality and LGBTQ issues. ( Photo : Adam Rose / Netflix ) Another day, another TV reboot. Our television screens are filled with revivals and remakes these days, including Roseanne, which returned on ABC with blockbuster ratings, the GIF - able Fab Five of Queer Eye on Netflix and the latest, Netflix's Lost
